page.title: 09GAMES IN THE PLAYGROUND - 2
page.content: These are "on it", "he", "catch" and "tay". Any number can play. One child is "on it". This child has to chase and catch another child who then becomes "on it" instead. {What's the Time Mr. Wolf} One child "the wolf" stands facing a wall. The other children form a line facing him. They gradually advance towards him saying "what's the time Mr. Wolf?. The Wolf answers 1 o'clock. Then the same happens again. Each time the children ask the time, they can step one step closer to him. When the Wolf thinks they are near enough he shouts "supper time" and catches as many children as possible. The wolf must make sure that no one gets to the wall or he is out.
